title: The Door
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Adolescent psychology
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Interpersonal relations in adolescence
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Teenagers - Family relationships
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children - Family relationships
description: The removal of a teenager's bedroom door by her frugal step father (he has insisted the family live on weet-bix for the last three years) is emblematic of family tension in this telling film about the perils of adolescent years, and the lack of communication within the family unit. Cast includes Barry Otto, Penne Hackforth-Jones and Inge Hornstra.
